name: The Last Defense (itch)
description:
The Last Defense is a action-packed, fast-paced, game where you must fight your way through hordes of zombies, lizard-men, and clone agents!

Upgrade your weapons, and achieve the ultimate highscore!

This game was developed by a 12 year old aspiring developer.

Use the up and down arrow keys to move and use the space bar to shoot.
